name: Fabricio Villalobos
body:
### Dr. Fabricio Villalobos
Research fellow  
Laboratório de Ecologia Teórica e Síntese  
Universidade Federal de Goiás  
Goiânia, Goiás, Brasil  
Investigador Nacional Nivel 1, SNI, México

I'm currently a research fellow at the Universidade Federal de Goiás (UFG), Brazil, where I'm also a collaborating professor at the Ecology and Evolution Graduate Program. I'm affiliated to the amazing group of José Alexandre Diniz-Filho <http://dinizfilho.wix.com/dinizfilholab>, working on macroecological theory and methods integrating macroecology with phylogenetic approaches to understand geographic patterns of biodiversity.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
